meanings.definition: An organism that maintains a constant body temperature.
meanings.sent1: The homeotherm bird stayed warm even on chilly days.
meanings.sent2: The homeotherm mammals are able to survive in various climates.
meanings.sent3: The homeotherm lizard always had the perfect temperature, making other lizards jealous.
meanings.sent4: She was a homeotherm, unwavering in her emotions regardless of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The homeotherm fish glowed with warmth, standing out in the cold ocean.

meanings.sent1: The homeotherm bear hibernated during the winter months.
meanings.sent2: The homeotherm rabbit had thick fur to keep itself warm.
meanings.sent3: The homeotherm cat snuggled up to its owner for extra warmth.
meanings.sent4: She was a homeotherm, radiating heat like a cozy fireplace.
meanings.sent5: The homeotherm dog wagged its tail happily, feeling the warmth within.

meanings.definition: A creature that regulates its own body temperature.
meanings.sent1: The homeotherm penguin huddled together with its colony to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: The homeotherm elephant used its ears to cool down in the hot sun.
meanings.sent3: The homeotherm squirrel adjusted its fur coat to stay comfortable in all seasons.
meanings.sent4: She was a homeotherm, always finding the perfect balance in any situation.
meanings.sent5: The homeotherm koala basked in the sun, regulating its body temperature effortlessly.
